===Unarmed===
Unarmed weapons will benefit from melee perks such as [[Martial Artist]], [[Incisor]], [[Ninja]], etc. However, damage perks are restricted to the [[Iron Fist]] perk instead of the melee perks. Unarmed weapons cannot be used while wearing [[Power armor (Fallout 76)|Power armor]].
